mapper.insert: insert into t_driver_info_table ( province, province_no, city, city_no, county, county_no, driver_id, is_delete, create_name, create_time, version, store_id, driver_acct ) values ( #{province}, #{provinceCode}, #{city}, #{cityCode}, #{county}, #{countyCode}, #{driverCode}, 0, #{createBy}, now(), 0, #{storeId}, #{driverAcct} )
